actions.description: Promote a release.

action.description: Promote a release.
action.name: release-promotion
action.title: Release Promotion

actions.name: release-promotion

build_number.description: The release build number. Starts at 1 per release version, and increments on rebuild.
build_number.title: The release build number

do_not_optimize.description: Optional: a list of labels to avoid optimizing out of the graph (to force a rerun of, say, funsize docker-image tasks).

next_version.description: Next version. Required in the following flavors: ['ship_devedition', 'ship_firefox']

partial_updates.description: Partial updates. Required in the following flavors: ['promote_devedition', 'promote_firefox', 'promote_firefox_rc', 'push_devedition', 'push_firefox', 'ship_devedition', 'ship_firefox', 'ship_firefox_rc']

previous_graph_ids.description: Optional: an array of taskIds of decision or action tasks from the previous graph(s) to use to populate our `previous_graph_kinds`.

rebuild_kinds.description: Optional: an array of kinds to ignore from the previous graph(s).

release_partner_build_number.description: The partner build number. This translates to, e.g. `v1` in the path. We generally only have to bump this on off-cycle partner rebuilds.

release_partner_config.description: Partner configuration to use for partner repacks.

release_partners.description: A list of partners to repack, or if null or empty then use the current full set

release_promotion_flavor.description: The flavor of release promotion to perform.

required_signoffs.description: The flavor of release promotion to perform.

revision.description: Optional: the revision to promote. If specified, and `previous_graph_kinds is not specified, find the push graph to promote based on the revision.
revision.title: Optional: revision to promote

version.description: Optional: override the version for release promotion. Occasionally we'll land a taskgraph fix in a later commit, but want to act on a build from a previous commit. If a version bump has landed in the meantime, relying on the in-tree version will break things.

actions.title: Release Promotion

actions.description: Merge repository branches.

action.description: Merge repository branches.
action.name: merge-automation
action.title: Merge Day Automation

actions.name: merge-automation

behavior.description: The type of release promotion to perform.

fetch-version-from.description: Path to file used when querying current version.

force-dry-run.description: Override other options and do not push changes

from-branch.description: The fx head of the source, such as central

from-repo.description: The URI of the source repository

push.description: Push changes using to_repo and to_branch

ssh-user-alias.description: The alias of an ssh account to use when pushing changes.

to-branch.description: The fx head of the target, such as beta

to-repo.description: The push URI of the target repository

actions.title: Merge Day Automation

symbol.description: Symbol to be used by the scheduled task.

test_manifests.description: An array of test manifest paths

times.title: Times
